CGT 512 - All Interesting UX/UI Blogs Combined

September 07, 2011 at 06:55 PM

Here is a list of all the blogs that our class found when we were tasked with finding an interesting UX/UI blog that we’ve never heard of before.

  • Chris - http://www.experientia.com/blog/
  • Dede - http://www.alistapart.com/articles/being-human-is-good-business/
  • Eddy Alex Quincy - UX Movement
  • Emma William - UX booth
  • Geovon – UX Zeitgeist
  • Jake – http://www.hongkiat.com/blog/
  • Jing – http://darmano.typepad.com/logic_emotion/
  • Joe – http://www.interactiondesignblog.com/
  • Laura – http://whitneyhess.com/blog/

All of these sites are worth checking out if you have any interest in them. I know I will be looking into the ones I have not been to when I get some time.

Tags:  blogs,  cgt-512,  interesting-blogs,  ui,  user-experience,  user-interface,  ux
